basics.name: Meghan Nagai
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at the Univeristy of Hawaii at Manoa. I am currently studying for a B.B.A. in Marketing and Management Information Systems from the Shidler College of Business. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
education.area: Marketing and Managament Information Systems (expected Spring, 2023)

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
